name: Animals Memory: Horses
description:
Animals Memory: Horses is a card game with pictures of different horses that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards. This part of the game more difficult to pass than the first part of the game "Animals Memory" because here the images are of horses, and because of this can be confusing.

Game features:
- Different levels of difficulty. From simple to complex.
- 30 cards with images of horses.
- It develops memory and is suitable for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children, teenagers and adults.
- 18 levels. Ranging from lightweight to large and complex levels.
